title: Data Scientist
description: When drilling operations began losing millions to unexpected downtime, I led the charge to turn raw telemetry into real-time intelligence. By deploying predictive ML models, I helped cut non-productive time by 15% and saved $2M annually. I engineered Random Forest and Gradient Boosting pipelines that pushed prediction accuracy to 92%, built Spark-based streaming alerts that notified engineers within minutes, and created a Tableau dashboard that turned hours of manual diagnosis into instant, data-driven decisions.

title: Graduate Data Scientist
description: Tasked with uncovering why student engagement was dropping, I transformed 15,000+ academic records into actionable insights. Through EDA and predictive modeling using ROC and AUC metrics, I identified retention drivers that reshaped academic strategies. By automating Python–SQL pipelines and designing Power BI dashboards, I accelerated reporting by 25% and empowered leadership to make faster, evidence-based policy decisions — all while ensuring strict data governance and compliance.

title: Data Analyst (Applied Data Science)
description: At Vertocity, I was challenged to improve student outcomes through data. I built XGBoost and Random Forest models that pinpointed at-risk learners, driving interventions that raised completion rates by 8%. My NLP sentiment analysis on 5,000+ reviews uncovered what students truly valued, fueling product enhancements that lifted satisfaction scores. From Tableau dashboards to cohort analytics, I turned raw data into clear stories that guided leadership and reshaped the learning experience.
